title: Ezreal "Arcane Shift out of Rocket Grab" From Blitzcrank
body: When Blitzcrank uses his q (RocketGrab) toward an enemy Ezreal Ezreal is able to quickly Press e (Arcane Shift) and is able to get out of the hook even if the hook hits and lands onto Ezreal he still isnt pulled. This is very frustrating for me and yes it is quite simple to out play but in early game he is very hard to get a solid hook onto him. im happy to make a short video to show what happens but only if its needed. If you are able to fix this that would be amazing because a lot of people go ezreal to counterpick blitzcrank but it just seems stupid. Thank you.{{champion:53}} {{champion:81}}

replies.body:
Hey quaZeR,

While we do appreciate you taking your time to report a bug, because this is the Help and Support boards, we try to limit posts to technical issues and general questions. As such, I'd like to direct you to the [**Report A Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) sub-boards for posting your bug reports. The Riot staff looking for bug reports frequent those sub-boards more than they frequent the Help & Support sub-boards, so you'll have a higher chance of having the issue addressed if you post there. 

Cheers!
